name: 'Ahlam Amir
description:
This topdown-2D RPG follows a brief dream that Amir is having during an extended stay at the hospital. 32 bit sprites and tile-stages are accompanied by 4 bar musical loops synchronized using Chuck's integration with Unity. The development period was about 3 weeks start to finish. I hope to expand on the infrastructure and the immense knowledge I gained making this game.

Link to the Demo
